trend_summary: Mostly forested terrain shows recurring timber harvests: early years mix woodland and scattered fields, mid-series reveals fresh clear-cuts, and the latest scene is dominated by extensive brown harvest blocks and enlarged cropland. Road grid stays constant and villages hardly expand, keeping settlement footprint minimal.
notable_changes: Marked increase in clear-cut patches, especially in central and eastern tracts.
Agricultural fields enlarge and coalesce, replacing former woodland.
Freshly harvested brown areas dominate latest image, indicating intensive logging cycle.
Minor forest regrowth visible where earlier cuts have greened over.
Road network and hamlet locations remain virtually unchanged, with little new construction.
